mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(userId, userPw, userName, userEmail) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userEmail})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET userPw = #{userPw}, userName = #{userName}, userEmail= #{userEmail}, userUpdatedate = now() WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_member where userId=#{userId} and userPw=#{userPw}
